content: We are using HAPI FHIR Server. We have created some resources in it, but now we want to remove (physically and not logically) all resources that we have created so far. We configured the server to use PostgreSQL. Is there any best practice to do so? How should we reset the database to its starting point status without having any resources?
Just dump the database. HAPI recreates the tables it needs by itself

Jens Villadsen said:

Just dump the database. HAPI recreates the tables it needs by itself

I don't understand you exactly. Could you explain more, please?
@Mohsen Jafari you said that you wanted to remove the resources - as in start from scratch. Delete the database and create a new one at point HAPI FHIR to the new one and you should be good to go
